message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I think 65/35 is fairer, considering the inflation impact will be more severe on your side. Let's settle this quickly.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.

I'm willing to meet you halfway.  Let's both acknowledge the inflation and settle on a 60/40 split. This ensures a quicker resolution, and we can both get a fair share before the money loses too much value.
